channel.title: Languages on PrestaShop Tests
channel.description: Recent content in Languages on PrestaShop Tests

item.title: BO - International - Localization - Languages - Filter
item.description: BO - International - Localization - Languages - Filter Steps Step Description Expected result Go to BO > International > Localization page > Languages tab Page is well displayed and title contains ‘Languages’ Filter by ID = 1 Number of languages after reset < Total of languages All rows column ID contains ‘1’ Reset filter Number of languages = Total of languages Filter by Name = ‘English (English)’ Number of languages after reset < Total of languages All rows column Name contains ‘English (English)’ Reset filter Number of languages = Total of languages Filter by ISO code = ‘en’ Number of languages after reset < Total of languages All rows column ISO code contains ‘en’ Reset filter Number of languages = Total of languages Filter by Language code = ‘en-us’ Number of languages after reset < Total of languages All rows column Language code contains ‘en-us’ Reset filter Number of languages = Total of languages Filter byÂ Date format = ’m/d/Y' Number of languages after reset < Total of languages All rows column Date format contains ’m/d/Y' Reset filter Number of languages = Total of languages Filter by Data format (full) = ’m/d/Y H:i:s' Number of languages after reset < Total of languages All rows column Date format (full) contains ’m/d/Y H:i:s' Reset filter Number of languages = Total of languages Filter by Active = ‘true’ Number of languages after reset < Total of languages All rows column Active contains ‘true’ Reset filter Number of languages = Total of languages

item.title: BO - International - Localization - Languages - CRUD
item.description: BO - International - Localization - Languages - CRUD Steps Step Description Expected result Go to languages page Page title contains ‘Languages’ reset filters Total of languages > 0 go to add new language page page title contains ‘Add new’ Create new languages (iso code : de, other data from faker) Successful message is displayed number of languages = total of languages + 1 go to FO New language exist in list of languages go back to BO and filter by name of created language First element in list is the language created go to edit language page page title contains ‘Edit :’ Edit language (disble language too)

item.title: BO - International - Localization - Languages - Bulk actions
item.description: BO - International - Localization - Languages - Bulk actions Steps Step Description Expected result Go to languages page page title contains ‘Languages’ Reset filters Total of products > 0 Go to add new language page Page title contains ‘Add new’ Create new language : name: ‘languageToDelete1’, isoCode: ‘fi’ Successful message is displayed number of languages = total of languages + 1 Go to add new language page Page title contains ‘Add new’ Create new language : name: ‘languageToDelete2’, isoCode: ‘ca’ Successful message is displayed

item.title: BO - International - Localization - Languages - Sort
item.description: BO - International - Localization - Languages - Sort Steps Step Description Expected result Go to languages page page title contains ‘Languages’ Sort languages by id_lang desc list is sorted by id_lang desc (3 -> 2 -> 1) Sort languages by name asc list is sorted by name asc (a -> b -> c) Sort languages by name desc list is sorted by name desc

item.title: BO - International - Localization - Languages - Quick edit
item.description: BO - International - Localization - Languages - Quick edit

item.title: BO - International - Localization - Languages - Help button
item.description: BO - International - Localization - Languages - Help button Steps Step Description Expected result Go to BO > International > Localization > Languages page The languages page is well displayed Click on Help The documentation modal is opened in English Close the modal The modal is well closed
